programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Australian Alps

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes

programme.title: Wildest India: Thar Desert: Sacred Sands

programme.title: Wildest Middle East: Egypt: Survivors in the Sands

programme.title: Wildest Indochina: Thailand: The Wild Heart

programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client continue the ultimate open-aired cruiser build and debut it a top West Coast car show. (Part 2)

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian gets a call from a top Hollywood picture car coordinator and works his magic to get a vintage race car back in action.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian is commissioned to help build a wild, massive mobile floating party island for a prestigious festival in the Nevada desert (Burning Man).

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: A new client comes into the picture with a vintage desire; a hand-built motorcycle in the vein of early Harley Davidson’s, but with a Full Custom twist. And later, Ian pushes the envelope with a cool electric bike build for himself.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: An old client brings in Ian to build a classic 54’ Chevy pickup truck from the ground up with some major custom upgrades.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: One of Ian’s most infamous show cars, Space Junkie, comes back to into the shop in a bizarre turn of events. The gem is in desperate need of rehab and Ian brings it back to life, better than ever, with some major reworking!

programme.title: Andromeda: It Makes a Lovely Light
programme.desc: Beka takes the Andromeda to Tarn-Vedra, but extended time in the slipstream causes side effects. To combat them, Beka starts taking Flash and soon becomes addicted.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: An old memory from the Andromeda is accidentally activated, which sends her on a mission and leaves Dylan and the crew unable to override the command.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan and Rommie must rescue Tyr, Harper and Rev from a Magog Worldship.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan, Beka, Rev and Tyr crash land after escaping a gang of Nietzscheans, but soon face a new threat: Rev's need to feed.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: The crew must steal a jewel that is at the center of a feud between a Drift owner and the Than. Beka falls for a security chief who was formerly a thief.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pitiless As the Sun
programme.desc: Andromeda answers a distress call when a cargo ship is attacked.

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: Our new team of “ Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to unmask the killer – or killers – of vivacious New Zealand hairdresser Paula Brown who was plucked from Sydney’s downtown after a night out with friends.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where's Grandad?
programme.desc: 65-year-old Alan Gordon Woodford of Bedford St. Mossburn left his home on foot Saturday morning April 20, 1985 and was never seen or heard of again.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Where There's Smoke
programme.desc: In 2006, 19-year-old Blake Stott died in a mysterious car fire. Blake had seemingly pulled into a South Otago lay-by to have a sleep, when his late-model, un-modified car burst into flames.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: A Bump in the Night
programme.desc: In 1980, six-year-old Alicia O'Reilly was raped and murdered in her bed, while her sister slept less than a metre away, and her mother sleeping across the hallway.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Long Way Home
programme.desc: 25-year-old Te Puke woman Judy Yorke was a devoted single mum who adored her kids. When she missed her daughter’s fourth birthday party, her family knew something was terribly wrong and reported her missing.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of the Dark
programme.desc: Described as a brutal execution, 46-year-old grandmother Chattrice Maihi-Carroll was found naked, stabbed to death in her New Zealand home in 2008. There were multiple suspects and everything seemed resolved following the arrest of a neighbour.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Butchered Boys
programme.desc: This episode revisits Adelaide's notorious Adelaide Family Murders case, where six young Adelaide men were murdered during the 1970s and '80s. The victims were found in random locations throughout the state, their bodies neatly cut into pieces.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Cop Killer: The Winchester Assassination
programme.desc: The highest ranking police officer in Australia to be murdered, Assistant Federal Police Commissioner Colin Winchester was shot twice in the head at point blank range as he was getting out of his car outside his Deakin home on 10 January 1989.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Devil Inside: John Ernest Cribb
programme.desc: A chilling investigation of John Ernest Cribb, who on August 11, 1978 broke into the home of the Connell's. On a winter’s afternoon, Valda Connell and her four-year-old son Damien arrived home after having collected ten-year-old Sally from school.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Greenough Family Massacre
programme.desc: The small hamlet of Greenough, near Geraldton in Western Australia, some 400 kilometres north of Perth, will forever be associated with one the most horrific murders in Australian criminal history.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Where the Heart is
programme.desc: A STORY: Nick's unhappiness leads to Tess deciding to return to Argentina with him - after receiving a 'sign' that Drovers Run supports her leaving. B STORY: A brumby stallion lures Phoenix back the wild.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A STORY: Jodi and Rob flee the hitman. Wounded, Rob leaves the district to give evidence at trial.B STORY: Patrick arrives with a truckload of Boer goats, wanting his brother Dave's help.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Big Commitment
programme.desc: A STORY: Patrick is accidentally blinded and must rely on Kate for help, leading to him accepting a full time job on Killarney. B STORY: Jodi arranges a surprise wedding for Meg and Terry and farewells them on a open ended trip around Australia.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Biting The Bullet
programme.desc: A STORY: Regan returns to Drovers Run with a devastating secret - two miners died when she signed off on explosions as mine manager. Hoping to heal, Regan asks if she can stay.B STORY: Through an accident, Fiona discovers she is infertile.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Second Best
programme.desc: A STORY: When The Colonel is stolen, Regan goes out of her way to help a 14 year old sheep duffer, as a way of assuaging her guilt over the dead miner's families.B STORY: Alex asks Stevie to be his best man...and Stevie ends up as Fiona's bridesmaid.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Trouble With Harry
programme.desc: A STORY: Jodi believes she has killed Harry Ryan in a car accident. Facing manslaughter charges, it is later revealed that Harry died of a heart attack.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Sam Taylor, the President & CEO of Oriental Trading Company, the largest retailer of party supplies in the United States, is going undercover in hopes of finding that the company’s mission of “selling fun.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Jose Mas, the CEO of MasTec, one of the largest builders of telecommunication and energy systems in North America, poses as a recently laid off high school basketball coach, getting a second chance at starting a new career.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Kristen Flynn, the boss of Premiere Van Lines. She’s a woman with a formidable reputation. Her own staff call her “Frugal Flynn” because she watches the pennies to protect profit.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Tervita specializes in environmental clean-up for Western Canada’s booming energy and mining industries. It doesn’t take long for Fory Musser,

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Paranormal Pirates
programme.desc: Fear is spreading at Fort Taber-Fort Rodmanthat a new \\"living history event\\" has stirred up frightening paranormal activity on the park grounds.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Public Poltergeist Number 1
programme.desc: The historic Old Lake County Jail was once considered to be inescapable... until notorious gangster John Dillinger, escaped from it in 1934. Over 80 years later, aggressive prisoners are breaking free as sealed areas.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Angel of Death
programme.desc: Behind the facade of a beautiful old Inn, lies the haunting memories of a home that was once part of the Underground Railroad, and the family that helped slaves to freedom.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Overdue For Death
programme.desc: Newly designated as a \\"Literary Landmark,\\" this library is consumed with ghostly visitors with a thirst for knowledge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: One for the Money
programme.desc: It hurts Dog to see people who after years of walking the straight and narrow, suddenly lose their way. But today's case is a member of the law enforcement community who has recently gone astray, and that truly troubles the Dog.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Reality Check
programme.desc: Dog is back in Denver and in hot pursuit of a woman wanted for identity theft. The sad reality is that the identify which has been robbed is her own. She's traded in a bright future for a life on the wrong side of the law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: No Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Being hunted by the Dog is a lousy way to celebrate your birthday but that's exactly the spot that Robert finds himself in today. He's missed his court date, quit his job, and vacated his last known address.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prayers and Mace
programme.desc: Both brother Tim and fellow Honolulu bondsman James need Dog's help to track down their hard to find fugitives. The two cases on the docket today are challenging, especially the hunt for Gregory, a felon with a lengthy rap sheet.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: New Dog in Town
programme.desc: It's Beth's birthday and Dog knows just what she needs. He surprises Beth with Delilah, a puppy small enough to sit in the palm of her hand. Beth is so happy that she insists on taking the puppy with her on today's bounty.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Trick or Treat
programme.desc: It's Halloween, and before Dog and Beth can help the kids carve their pumpkins, they have some business to attend to. It involves knocking on doors and meeting the neighbors but instead of hunting for treats they're on the search for a fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Girl Trouble
programme.desc: Dog and the team have girl trouble in this case. Krystal jumped bail and seems to have vanished into the high plains of Colorado. To make matters worse, she's running with her lover (and bond co-signer) Carrie. But Thelma and Louise they ain't.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Seeing the Light
programme.desc: Today Leland and Dog make a quick visit to the police supply store to get some new gadgets for the team but they can't linger because they've also got a fugitive to catch. Their target is reputed to have an explosive temper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: When a Stranger Calls
programme.desc: When an offender with a long record ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call - The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Let's Go Hunting, Deer
programme.desc: Willie and Jase invite Korie and Missy along on a deer hunt because they believe their wives have become too "city." At Phil and Kay's, Miss Kay decides she wants to frame Phil's original blueprints from the first duck call he created.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Tickets To The Fun Show
programme.desc: During Duck Commander's "Casino Night" party, Si Robertson wins the grand prize of $2000 and decides to buy a massage chair for the duck call room. The massage chair becomes a detriment to the workflow, so Willie takes Si around for a replacement prize.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Be a Lady
programme.desc: Sadie, has a homecoming dance coming up, but Willie doesn't approve of her dress selection. Willie decides to take Sadie out to find her a new "appropriate" dress.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ring Around the Redneck
programme.desc: Though Jase lost his wedding ring long ago, Missy decides it's time for Jase to replace it with a new one. When Jase is duck hunting, once again, he loses the ring.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bass Man Standing
programme.desc: The Duck Commander team is invited to unveil a wing of the local Bass Pro shop that will feature their products.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Battle of the Brothers
programme.desc: Willie's suspicious behavior from dyeing his beard to buying a new motorcycle, makes Jase come to the conclusion that Willie is having a mid-life crisis.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Aloha, Robertsons!
programme.desc: After all their hard work, Willie decides to take the entire Robertson clan on a family vacation to Hawaii. But Willie's daily itinerary for the trip gets constantly undermined by the family's desire to participate in their own island activities.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Till Duck Do Us Part
programme.desc: Everyone comes together to plan a surprise wedding for Phil and Kay, setting up a special ceremony on their land, which the whole family attends. Si distracts Phil and Kay by taking them on a "trip down memory lane".

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: So You Think You Can Date?
programme.desc: After discovering that Martin has to miss a Friday night poker game for a date, the guys (as well as their wives) take turns figuring out the best way to coach him for romance. When babysitting for Jep and Jessica turns into a rocky road.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Cliffside Castle
programme.desc: Beat takes on one of the most perilous builds of his career, a luxury twin-turreted vacation home on the edge of 100-foot cliff.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Coming Home
programme.desc: In Alberta, Beat is tasked with building one man’s dream home on the picturesque farmland where he grew up.

programme.title: Timber Kings: It’s a Dirty Job
programme.desc: A reluctant Joel joins forces with his wife to construct a backyard obstacle course that he hopes will prepare them for one Tough Mudder of a race.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Out of the Ashes
programme.desc: Peter helps restore a Manitoba couple’s love for logs by building a home to replace the one they tragically lost to fire. Meanwhile, the renovation of a neighborhood bar nearly drives Bryan Jr. to drink.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Frying Pan into the Fire
programme.desc: Bryan Jr. whips up an outdoor kitchen before hitting the beach in search of the ultimate driftwood bar.

programme.title: Timber Kings: Going for Gold
programme.desc: Joel takes on the mother of all builds – a 20,000-sq./ft. Pennsylvania mansion complete with walk through tree, hand-carved totem pole and 3-story spiral log staircase.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Pour Up Drank
programme.desc: Floyd Steven’s jealousy is leading Alqueisha “Quey” Benjamin to consider breaking it off. Quey is becoming an alcoholic because of his controlling ways, but Floyd has caught her in a few lies and suspects her of cheating!

programme.title: Divorce Court: Super Freak
programme.desc: Khasha says Jermaine is always too busy for her and doesn't respect her. Jermaine says his young girlfriend wants sex all the time and is extremely messy! Can Judge Toler help them find a middle ground?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: What Women Want
programme.desc: La'Tanya is honest to Jonathan with her sexual attraction tp other women. The final straw was when her kids came home singing "Jonathan is a bad daddy" after returning from a relative's house. Will Lynn send them separate ways?

programme.title: Divorce Court: The Punisher
programme.desc: Shea says Jessica constantly punishes him due her history of cheating exes. She must know where Shea is every second forcing his friends to cut ties. Jessica has caught Shea lying to her in the past. Can Judge Lynn Toler get them on track?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Hot Tamale
programme.desc: Madeline says Edward is more of a detective than a husband. Edward says anytime Madeline is upset, she takes it out by destroying property in the house. She has destroyed an entire apartment and he can’t take it anymore.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Firecracker
programme.desc: Gary claims Ebony's verbally abusive, acts like a dictator and is frustrated with her disrespectful comments. She loves Gary very much and claims to be a 'ride or die' girlfriend, but is over Gary's unmotivated, stuck in the mud ways.

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stir Crazy
programme.desc: America says that Nathaniel’s controlling ways has taken the relationship to the point of no return. Nathaniel says she’s always flirting with other men and even coming home with a hickies.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: When the going got tough, Dermartess left his children and Rofiesha. Dermartess says Rofiesha forced him to leave 7 years ago. He still loves her and wants to see his children but believes she was too toxic. Can Judge Lynn Toler save this couple?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Out for Delivery
programme.desc: Jeanine says Marvin is cheating with co-workers and often meets up with his exes when they visit family in their hometown. He asserts she’s the one who cheated, not him, and she is so insecure she won’t stop bugging him about it.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Young Love
programme.desc: Anissa and Ma’lik have been together for 9 years and they have endured a lot of heartache due to Ma’lik’s cheating and dishonesty. Ma’lik says he’s not the same man he used to be and he’s trying to keep his family together..

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Prodigal Son
programme.desc: Dog and his old friends, Tim Chapman and Sonny Westbrook are riding with the team, so their target, a thief with violent tendencies, is out of luck. When Dog learns that the fugitive is also a disrespectful son, he is more motivated to find his man.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Family Ties
programme.desc: Dog doesn't have the whole team today and he's got to catch a fugitive with a record of criminal assault. But when Dog finds the fugitive's former girlfriend, she thinks he isn't dangerous at all.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Special Delivery
programme.desc: For months, this fugitive has been stringing Leland along with a series of barely believable excuses. Out of patience, Leland calls in the Big Dog. The whole team heads out to put pressure on the family and friends of the fugitive.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surface Scratches
programme.desc: Dog's latest quarry is running from abuse and assault charges. As Dog investigates, he discovers that this fugitive has gamed the system by jumping from one bond, and one bondsman, to another.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Great Debate
programme.desc: When the co-signer of a bond is also romantically involved with the defendant, sometimes the bondman is put in the middle of a lover's quarrel.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Facebooked
programme.desc: Dog is in Denver helping Bobby Brown to track down a fugitive with a long rap sheet. But unfortunately they have no picture of the felon to work with, so the challenges are big on this one. But Dog discovers a new source; "Facebook".

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mano-a-Mano
programme.desc: Back in Colorado, Dog's on the hunt for a runner with more than a decade's worth of trouble with the law. But the fugitive's friends and family are reluctant to help Dog bring him in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Road Show: Where Mercy is Shown
programme.desc: After releasing the second part of his autobiography, Dog and his family traveled across America, and this very special episode offers an intimate portrait of both the public and private moments of that journey.

programme.title: Run's House: Chicks Fly the Coop
programme.desc: Run's blood boils upon finding that his backyard pool house has become filled with family junk. He vows to clean it out, which unleashes conflict with every family member who wants to hang onto some possession.

programme.title: Run's House: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: Run often talks about how much he loves to win, but it's not until we see his family compete against one another that we understand that the drive to dominate runs thick in the Simmons blood.

programme.title: Run's House: JoJo Wins and Justine Loses
programme.desc: After overindulging at Russell Simmons' remarkable star-studded charity bash in the Hamptons, Justine decides to go on a diet. Determined to make it work, she enlists the help of a personal trainer.

programme.title: Run's House: Run's Family Vacation
programme.desc: When Vanessa gets a call from her Ford modeling agent to do a fashion shoot in Colorado, Run decides that bringing the family along for a summer vacation would be the perfect adventure to share before school starts.

programme.title: Girlfriends: And Baby Makes Four
programme.desc: William has second thoughts about fatherhood.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Viva Las Vegas
programme.desc: Joan hears wedding bells – but are they all in her mind?

programme.title: Girlfriends: Between Brock and a Hard Place
programme.desc: Brock shocks Joan with news that could end their engagement.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Don't You Want Me Baby?
programme.desc: When Toni revisits the past, it could destroy her future with Todd.

programme.title: Girlfriends: Merry Ex-Mas
programme.desc: Maya claims she’s over Darnell – but is she?

programme.title: Girlfriends: Prophet and Loss
programme.desc: Joan and William are haunted by the words of a stranger who’s either a psychic – or a psycho.

programme.title: Girlfriends: A Comedy of Eros
programme.desc: Valentine’s Day finds Toni meddling in Joan’s love life, and William hoping to make a date with destiny

programme.title: Paranormal State: Invitation to Evil
programme.desc: Paula and her husband Mike are under siege by a purported shadow demon in their North Carolina home. Paula has witnessed a toddler bed levitating and heard deep growls. Michelle, Ryan and the team uncover the shocking truth behind the haunting.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Ryan leads his team to one of the most haunted places in the US to confront their fears and solve a paranormal mystery. Aside from the alleged spirits of dead prisoners, something even darker may be lurking inside West Virginia State Penitentiary.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vegas
programme.desc: The PRS travels to Sin City to investigate a 14-year old medium who claims to speak to a dead girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Death Room
programme.desc: PRS arrives in Ryan's hometown to help the new owner of an old southern plantation unearth its dark history.?A painful family secret reveals a tale of greed and neglect, and the team must help free its unwilling victim from her spiritual prison.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Laws of Attraction
programme.desc: When Paula's young autistic son Michael, with limited verbal skills uttered the words "Go away scary dead boy" -- it sent a chill up her spine.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lady Vampire
programme.desc: PRS investigates a case involving single mom, Dawn, and her 5-year-old daughter, both of whom are tormented by the appearance of a hag they call "lady vampire."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear

programme.title: Arthur: The Last Day (Part 1 & 2)
programme.desc: It's a time of change at Lakewood Elementary as Arthur and Buster move up to 4th grade. D.W. and Bud prepare to enter kindergarten and Muffy and Francine contemplate how spending the summer away from each other will affect their friendship.

programme.title: Arthur: The Case of the Girl with the Long Face/The Substitute Arthur
programme.desc: Fern's been feeling low and no one can figure out why. Luckily, Buster Baxter is on the case! With Arthur out of town, Buster is on the hunt for a new best friend, but he only wants to play games HIS way. Will Buster learn to compromise?

programme.title: Arthur: Citizen Frensky/D.W.'S Backpack Mishap
programme.desc: After visiting The Elwood City Times, Francine decides to start her own paper--The Frensky Star! The tabloid is a success--until all her friends stop speaking to her. Somebody stole D.W.'s backpack!! Who is this fluffy unicorn thief?

programme.title: Arthur: The Great MacGrady, Parts 1 & 2
programme.desc: When Mrs. MacGrady is diagnosed with cancer, Arthur and his friends all react differently to the news. The kids must learn how to come together to help support each other and Mrs. MacGrady.

programme.title: Arthur: Meek For A Week/Arthur, World's Greatest Gleeper
programme.desc: Muffy bets Francine she can't be nice to everyone for a whole week--and soon wishes she hadn't. Next, Arthur didn't mean to tell a lie, he just got stuck in a sort of fib, because he thought it was cool to be a Gleeper.

programme.title: Arthur: The Hallway Minotaur/Ladonna's Like List
programme.desc: Attention Lakewood Elementary! There's a new sheriff—er--hallway monitor-in town, and his name is George Lundgren. Ladonna Compson is friendly, funny, and full of personality. Everyone likes her! At least, that's what she thought.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur's Chicken Pox/Sick As A Dog
programme.desc: The circus is in town and the whole family's excited—until Arthur gets CHICKEN POX! Will he recover in time? Then, Arthur's worst fears come true when poor, sick Pal has to sleep overnight at the vet's office. Could it be something he did?

programme.title: Arthur: The "A" Team/Emily Swallows a Horse
programme.desc: Francine and Brain are the best players on the soccer team, and they wish their teammates could take the game a bit more seriously. And then Emily really wants the sparkly ball D.W. just found, so she tells a little white lie about it.

programme.title: Arthur: Prunella Sees the Light/Return of the Snowball
programme.desc: For her sleepover with Marina, Prunella redecorates her room. But Marina is blind--will the decorations she can't see offend her, or worse, make her trip? D.W. has been trying to solve the mystery of her snowball's disappearance.

programme.title: War Story
programme.desc: In April and May 1945, the long-suffering Dutch people, enduring the German-imposed Hongerwinter famine, enthusiastically welcomed their Canadian liberators, establishing the intense connection sustained for 70 years.

programme.title: The Blitz
programme.desc: The Blitz looks at the build-up to the raids and detailed footage of the destruction that followed. It features interviews from those who lived through it and stories of sadness and bravery, at a time when Britain held strong and swore not to surrender.

programme.title: Battle of Britain
programme.desc: To commemorate the 70th Anniversary of the Battle of Britain Ewan and Colin McGregor take to the skies to discover how; against the odds, the RAF inflicted Hitler's first defeat of WW2.

programme.title: Embedded 45' - Shooting War in Germany: Embedded 45 - Shooting War in Germany 1
programme.desc: This first episode covers the last week of February to late March. When American troops started their final invasion of Nazi Germany in February 1945, U.S. Army cameramen were at their side.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Dylan receives an anonymous text warning him that his online love, Ally, is not who she says she is. After the mystery texter is revealed, Nev and Max uncover a huge web of deceit! (S6, ep10)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Artis & Jess
programme.desc: Five months ago Artis met Jess online. Artis and Jess each were in relationships, but believed they'd found true love. But is Jess everything that she says she is?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show

programme.title: Robot Wars

programme.title: Property Brothers: Andrew & Sarah
programme.desc: Desperate to be closer to friends and family, new parents Andrew and Sarah just moved back to the city. But their basement digs at Grandma’s are seriously cramping their style.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Derek & Jennifer
programme.desc: Expecting their first child within months and fed up with squeezing into their urban condo, Derek and Jennifer are facing a serious time crunch in their search for a sprawling home in a family-friendly lakeside community

programme.title: Property Brothers: Shannon & Darl
programme.desc: After years of hard-core studying and dorm-size apartments, nurse Shannon and doctor Darl are ready for their real estate graduation. And since they’re now expecting their first child, they’ve got mere months to get out.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Nancy & Dave
programme.desc: Tired of crashing on her best friend’s couch, biker chick bombshell Nancy is hoping to score a suburban pad of her own, complete with a feminine-industrial flair that reflects her personality, and a two-car chick-cave.

programme.title: Property Brothers: Samantha & Yaron

programme.title: Property Brothers: Christine & Thomas

programme.title: A Haunting: Games of Lies

programme.title: A Haunting: Spellbound
programme.desc: Sandra learns her house is haunted. She tries to perform Wiccan ceremonies but opens a portal.

programme.title: A Haunting: Buried Secrets
programme.desc: Strange sounds and eerie sensations lead Charles Gonzales to suspect that a spirit haunts his Florida home. Charles asks Desiree to investigate his home. There, Desiree encounters the vicious spirit who seeks to keep Charles in its clutches forever.

programme.title: A Haunting: Spirits of the Dead
programme.desc: The Whitley’s buy a farmhouse that houses a negative presence. The presence turns physical.

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Thomas and Jack having fun playing on the beach and building sandcastles. In Teletubbyland the Teletubbies are going round and round.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet rises and Laa-Laa and Dipsy play a going up and going down game. They go up the hill and then they go down the hill. They do it again and again.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Noo-noo wakes up the Teletubbies to watch some children paint a huge mural using spray paints. Laa-Laa is making Tubby Custard, but the Tubby Custard machine makes a big Tubby Custard squirt on Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Po and Laa-Laa.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch two girls climb a hill and look at the view. In Teletubbyland, Po looks for Tinky Winky. Over the hills, between the trees and along the path, but she couldn’t see him.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Andy Brown and Amber look for some ladybirds. Tinky Winky, Dipsy & Laa-Laa decide to go high up. Tinky Winky walks to the top of the path.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Some girls live with their Mum and Dad on a boat. They show us inside the boat. The Teletubbies come out of the house. Tinky Winky and Po go left and Dipsy and Laa-Laa go right.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It is Wendy’s birthday, but she insists she doesn’t want any fuss – such as a surprise party. She heads off to start the day’s work, laying a Heritage Trail around the town, and Bob reveals to the Machines that he is not planning a party.

programme.title: When Bob Became a Builder
programme.desc: It’s a beautiful day in Sunflower Valley and Bob and his machine team are building a new picnic area at the beach. Dizzy, Lofty and Scrambler are clearing stuff that’s been washed up on the beach, while Benny has a great time digging with Scoop and Muck.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: A new machine has come to the Valley – Packer the Delivery Truck. He’s to work with Farmer Pickles team. Farmer Pickles gives Packer his jobs and he sets off on his first delivery round.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Scrambler is desperate to help Bob build a drying barn for Farmer Pickles sunflower farm. Scruffty is also excited about the building job and runs and jumps about getting in everyone’s way.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is building an extraordinary new cave-house for Sandy Beach – a caveman expert who’s moving to the valley to study how cavemen used to live. The team are all head into the mountains.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Farmer Pickles has decided to open a camp site on his land, and Bob is installing a shower block and fence to keep the sheep out. For once, he is working on his own while Wendy goes on holiday with Jenny.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Roley is desperate to help with the apple harvest, but there’s not much a road roller can do to help. Farmer Pickles, meanwhile, asks Bob to build him a new press to make apple juice. Roley tries to help Spud collect a load of apples

programme.title: The Big Dino Dig
programme.desc: In this new episodic special Bob and the team tackle a big new job – building a dinosaur-themed fun park. With the help of park manager Tony Toberomi and new dumper truck Rubble, the team constructs a roller coaster, slide, train ride and flying ride.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team are installing a bull-rush water recycling system to clean water from Farmer Pickles’ cottage. The clean water will be used to water Farmer Pickles new orchard. Bob explains that everything needs to be built in order – it’s a process.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a big day, as the team are building Bob’s new workshop at his new yard. Scoop is desperate to get stuck in and beavers about doing everything he can to help. Bob needs some old floorboards collecting from Bobsville, and sends Scoop to pick them up.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr Sabatini has decided to move from Bobsville to set up the Sunflower Valley bakery. Bob and the team are going to build him a new house close to the river. Muck asks if Spud can tag along as he’s been telling him exciting stories.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s building a ‘drying tunnel’ for drying Annie seaweed. Muck passes Mr Beasley who’s having a spot of bother with his washing. He decides to build Mr Beasley a drying tunnel for his washing.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob’s renovating a dilapidated old watermill in Sunflower Valley – it’s going to make flour from Farmer Pickles sunflower farm. After checking that it’s safe, Bob realises that one of the millstones has gone missing. How very odd!

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs Bentley are moving house, and Bob is carrying out a loft conversion at their new home. Mr Bentley greets Bob and his team, then leaves for work. The removal company call to say that they have several staff off with flu.

programme.title: Skyscrapers and Car Parks
programme.desc: Join Bob on his next visit On Site! Follow Bob and the team as they take us through the construction of skyscrapers & car parks. Learn how skyscrapers are built up high on strong foundations and see how lifts are needed to carry people to the top.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: The Murder Of Jill Dando
programme.desc: Documentary examining the unsolved murder of British TV presenter and newsreader Jill Dando, who was shot outside her house in Fulham, London, in 1999.

programme.title: Crimes That Shook Britain: Shipman

programme.title: The Lost World: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: Roxton learns what it's like to be the hunted after he kills a Triceratops. Osina-a mystical, half-dinosaur guardian-puts a curse on him that makes him the target of a mysterious hunter.

programme.title: The Lost World: True Spirit
programme.desc: Veronica and Marguerite use a ouija board to communicate with Malone, who Veronica believes is trapped in a spirit realm. However, their attempt may have aroused the spirit of Saros, a dead warlord.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Knife
programme.desc: Malone's time in the spirit realm has given him psychic abilities. When he and Challenger discover a morbid campsite, Malone is encouraged to use his new powers to solve the case of Jack the Ripper.

programme.title: The Lost World: Fire in the Sky
programme.desc: A dying stranger issues a warning to three of the explorers, begging them to find a hunter named Pierson Rice. Roxton shares a common, painful past with the mysterious Rice.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Robert Bathurst and Amanda Donohue team up with experts Philip Serrrell and David Harper. They take their classic cars on a ride through Norfolk and Lincolnshire, hunting for hidden treasure and learning the dark secret of Valentine's Day.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: TV presenter Janet Ellis and her pop-star daughter Sophie Ellis Bextor travel from Essex to Yorkshire with Philip Serrell and Will Axon. On the way, Janet hears about a long-lost soldier and Sophie pays homage to the humble honeybee.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Rosemary Shrager and Jean-Christophe Novelli hit the road in a classic Ford Mustang. Margie Cooper and Paul Laidlaw help the chefs sift through bargains in Yorkshire, but will a passion for cookery-themed items land the chefs in hot water?

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's 80's superstar turned gardener Kim Wilde vs. Home Front in The Garden visionary Diarmuid Gavin. Helping them cut through the antiques undergrowth from Hertfordshire to Cheshire--in a Jaguar XJS--are Jonathan Pratt and Will Axon.

programme.title: FIBA 3x3 Basketball
programme.desc: See the world's top female stars race to the 2025 finals in Sumgait.

programme.title: Roller Derby
programme.desc: All Women’s Sports Network (AWSN) is a global sports television network dedicated exclusively to women’s sports. The channel offers live women’s sports matches and games, featuring some of the biggest leagues in the world.

programme.title: FIBA 3x3 Basketball
programme.desc: Coverage of 3x3 basketball competitions from around the world.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Fallon Sherrock and Ted Evetts join Chris Murphy on Tungsten Talk to discuss their World Championship clash.

programme.title: Tungsten Talk: Lisa Ashton
programme.desc: Lisa Ashton joins Chris Murphy and Matthew Edgar on Tungsten Talk to reflect on her remarkable career.

programme.title: The Around the World Challenge II
programme.desc: The Around the World Challenge II, featuring John O'Shea, Brian Raman, and more!

programme.title: Oche to Oven: Richie Burnett and Steve Beaton
programme.desc: From the heat of competition to the heat of the kitchen, Beaton and Burnett cook up food and conversation.

programme.title: Break of Throw: Mikuru Suzuki and Kirsty Hutchinson
programme.desc: Ten-time World Champion Trina Gulliver analyses the throwing styles of Mikuru Suzuki and Kirsty Hutchinson.

programme.title: Break of Throw: Beau Greaves and Fallon Sherrock
programme.desc: Laura Turner analyses the throws of two top female competitors in the game, Beau Greaves and Fallon Sherrock.

programme.title: Darts Icons - Russ Bray and George Noble
programme.desc: Chris Murphy interviews Russ Bray and George Noble as they reveal darts' biggest secrets and more!

programme.title: Influencer Event III Final: Charlie Murphy vs. George Scaife
programme.desc: Catch the full match replay of Charlie Murphy vs. George Scaife.

programme.title: The Best of Steve Beaton: Top Moments & Highlights
programme.desc: Watch the best moments from Steve Beaton, showcasing his top highlights and unforgettable darts from his debut.

programme.title: Catfish UK: Alayah & Tommy
programme.desc: Alayah and Tommy started messaging on a live streaming platform. Alayah thinks he could be the one, but when they try and meet, he keeps cancelling. Nella and Oobah help to track him down. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Taylor & Brad
programme.desc: Taylor is falling in love with Brad despite never having seen his face. Can Oobah and Nella find the man of her dreams, and will Taylor get her happy ever after? (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Hayley & Alex
programme.desc: Oobah is joined by Catfish US royalty Kamie to help Hayley finally meet Alex. But after five months of avoiding phone calls and cancelling on her, will she get her a fairy tale ending? (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Mario & Hannah
programme.desc: After turning his life around, Mario met his soulmate, Hannah. But she refuses to speak on the phone and won't meet in person. Julie and Oobah try to find out who his dream girl really is. (S1, ep7)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Emma & Harry
programme.desc: After six months, single mum Emma and online love Harry have already set a wedding date. But the problem is, they've never met. So it's up to the Catfish UK team to track him down. (S1, ep8)

programme.title: Catfish UK: Luke & Amy
programme.desc: Drummer Luke first started talking to nurse Amy when she came to one of his gigs 6 months ago. They had an instant spark but unfortunately every time they try and meet she cancels. (S2, ep9)

programme.title: 48 Hours: OJ Simpson: Endgame
programme.desc: The OJ Simpson trial for the murder of Nicole Brown Simpson and Ron Goldman, the controversy that surrounded it, the impact it had on race relations, including the current and recent uproar over race, patriotism, and free speech in America.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Deadly Prophecy
programme.desc: Faylene Eaves, divorced Arizona mother of two, married Doug Grant, a divorced single dad, in 1993. They were both Mormons. Faylene had revelations from God that could have contributed to her death, however her husband was found guilty of murdering her.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Mystery of Slide Mountain
programme.desc: A report that examines evidence and unanswered questions regarding a June 1, 1998 auto accident on Slide Mountain, near Reno, Nevada, that led to the death of Rinette Riella Bergna and left the driver, Rinette’s husband Peter with only minor injuries.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Father and Son
programme.desc: A teenager makes a discovery that could prove his mother's death was not suicide.

programme.title: 48 Hours: A Cop Behind Bars
programme.desc: Patrick Bradford, was convicted of stabbing his mistress to death. Determined to win his acquittal, Deborah Nolan, a close friend, and staunch supporter of Bradford’s, quit her teaching job and went to law school to take on his defense.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Playing With Fire
programme.desc: In September 2002, two men were found executed in a burning Mercedes in an upscale Hollywood neighborhood. What initially looked like a drug-related murder, turned out to be something entirely different, but the crime scene left little evidence to go on.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Rocket
programme.desc: A top-secret rocket is compromised when one of the scientists runs into gambling debts. Peter heads out on a desperate search for the missing rocket.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Point of Destruction
programme.desc: Four tragic air accidents seem to point to the failure of a fuel diffuser being tested, but Peter suspects sabotage is at play.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Death Cell
programme.desc: An escaped mental patient comes to Peter, asking for his help in getting her fiancͩ cleared of a murder charge as he awaits execution.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Vanishing Evidence
programme.desc: A European spy kills a British professor and steals vital papers. M.I.5 recruits Peter to go to to Amsterdam and recover the scientific research.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The Prize
programme.desc: In Scandinavia, at a prize-awarding ceremony, Peter must rescue a writer being held for speaking out against her repressive government.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Flight into Darkness
programme.desc: Dr. Stephens believes his anti-gravity research will endanger mankind; he destroys the papers and disappears. Brady is summoned to track him down.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Decoy
programme.desc: Identical twins Toni and Terry Trent are a popular musical act, performing for the troops on a USO tour of Britain. Brady volunteers to help Toni when Terry disappears at a Soho hotel where she had earlier witnessed a murder.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: The White Rabbit
programme.desc: French authorities call Peter when a doctor brings in a white rabbit she says materialized out of thin air before her eyes.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' The Invisible Man: Man in Disguise
programme.desc: The Invisible man is investigating an international drug ring when his identity is stolen by a beautiful young woman and used to smuggle drugs.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Scott and the Howlers
programme.desc: After Scott and his rock band perform a song on a televised talent show, Scott is discovered by a record label that wants to sign him.

programme.title: Teen Wolf: Howlin' Cousins
programme.desc: Scott visits his cousin, Todd, but the two have nothing in common. As Scott tries to help Todd come out of his shell, he realizes that he and his cousin are much more alike than he initially thought.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: "Bloody Mary… " It was just a silly wishing game; one that Lindsey and her friends had played a thousand times in front of a dozen different mirrors.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: Peter Newman wants a brand new mountain bike. That's the grand prize for winning the school's talent competition. Now all he needs is a talent.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: For Katie and Andy Lawrence, moving to a new town is painful enough. But when their parents take them on a boring sight-seeing tour, it's nothing but torture.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: Everyone in Baskerville knows about Jimmy Leeds. In fact, Adam and his friends have been telling scary stories about Jimmy for years—stories they don't really believe.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: Willy Tyler has the coolest train set-up ever. It takes up half of Willy’s attic and encompasses everything from medieval times to the Wild West.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: For Catan Thomas and his cousin, Lea, being trapped in Bumbleweed for a family reunion and their grandfather’s 70th birthday is painful enough.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: When Cody visits his grandparents at Shady Acres, he’s not expecting to find any excitement at all.

programme.title: Deadtime Stories
programme.desc: It’s all Sammy’s fault. If only he and Nina hadn’t been out in those woods in the first place. If only they hadn’t seen that creepy old tree with the strange little door.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E9 - Out Of Their Minds
programme.desc: An alien ship fires a weapon at Moya. The blast makes it through and causes everyone's consciousness to jump into another body.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E10 - My Three Crichtons
programme.desc: A strange globe appears on Moya, sucking in Crichton and duplicating him creating two additional people.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E11 - Look At The Princess, Part 1: A Kiss Is But A Kiss
programme.desc: On a planet about to crown its new monarch. The problem is the Princess cannot ascend unless she finds a genetically compatible mate.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E12 - Look At The Princess, Part 2: I Do, I Think
programme.desc: The Queen offers Crichton a choice; marry her daughter the crown princess, or she'll turn him over to Scorpius.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E13 - Look At The Princess, Part 3: The Maltese Crichton
programme.desc: John Crichton faces eighty years as a statue. That is, until the Scarran Cargn decapitates the statue and drops the head into a vat of acid.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E14 - Beware Of Dog
programme.desc: The crew bring aboard an alien tracker to remove some creatures that came aboard hidden in some cargo.
